sentences.sentence: But now high-level delegations will reopen talks that broke up earlier this year.
sentences.translation: 但现在高层代表团将恢复今年早些时候中断的对话。

sentences.sentence: The delegations had begun to build up some trust in one another.
sentences.translation: 各代表团已经开始逐步增强相互的信任。

sentences.sentence: A: Some delegations mentioned this issue.
sentences.translation: 答：有些代表团提到了这一问题。
